function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation effectiveness leading to higher infection rates","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and higher infection rates in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation effectiveness and air distribution in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HVAC systems, air exchange systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially those with high occupancy densities","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Inaccurate calibration of infective quantum in Wells-Riley model","Impact":"Inaccurate prediction of infection rates and ineffective control of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Careful calibration of the infective quantum using real pandemic case data and verification with actual infection rates","Technologies":"Data modeling and simulation software, real-time infection rate monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient social distancing measures leading to increased disease transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and increased infection rates in crowded environments","Mitigation":"Implementing and enforcing adequate social distancing measures based on scientific research and guidelines","Technologies":"Space occupancy monitoring systems, crowd density monitoring software, contact tracing technology","People":"Event organizers, facility managers, public health officials","Owner":"Event organizers, facility managers, government agencies"}]}
